seo.title: Privacy Policy
seo.description: Learn how we collect, use, and protect your personal data. Transparency and GDPR compliance.

hero.title: Privacy Policy
hero.subtitle: We protect your data and only use it to serve you better.

collect.title: Data we collect
collect.p1: We collect the information you share via our forms (e.g., Name, Email, Phone, Subject, Message, and details useful for a quote: part/spring type, dimensions, quantities, materials).
collect.p2: Non-identifying browsing data (e.g., pages visited, device, browser) may also be collected to improve the experience.

usage.title: How we use data
usage.li1: Reply to your contact requests and prepare quotes.
usage.li3: Improve our website and services (anonymized statistics).

legal.title: Legal basis & retention
legal.p1: Processing relies, as applicable, on pre-contractual measures (quotes), our legitimate interest (improvement, security) and/or your consent.
legal.p2: Data is retained for as long as needed for the purposes above, then archived or deleted in line with legal obligations.

security.title: Sharing & security
security.p1: We do not sell or rent your data. It may be shared with service providers (hosting, emailing, analytics) strictly for the intended purposes and under confidentiality obligations.
security.p2: We implement technical and organizational measures to protect your information against unauthorized access, loss, or alteration.

cookies.title: Cookies
cookies.p1: Cookies may be used to ensure proper site operation and measure audience in aggregate. You can manage preferences in your browser settings.
cookies.p2: If a consent banner is shown, your choice will be honored and can be changed anytime.

rights.title: Your rights
rights.li1: Access to your data and a copy of it.
rights.li5: Withdraw consent at any time for consent-based processing.

contact.title: Contact
contact.p: For any question or request about your data, contact us at <email>contact@mtr.tn</email>. You can also use our <help>help desk</help>.

cta.question: Questions about your data? Our team replies quickly.

seo.title: Help & Support | MTR Manufacturer of Springs & Wireforms
seo.description: Need help? Check our FAQ or contact our team.
seo.ogAlt: Help Center — MTR Manufacturer of Springs & Wireforms

seo.title: Help Desk – Support & Quotes
seo.description: Contact our support, request a quote or check the FAQ. Quick response.

hero.title: MTR Help Desk
hero.subtitle: Need a quote, technical advice or order follow-up? We’re here to help.

faq.title: Frequently asked questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know before contacting us.
faq.checkline: Can’t find your answer? Write to us below.

q1.t: How do I request a quote?
q1.a: Go to the Quote page (button in the top bar or footer). Fill in your specs (spring type, material, dimensions, quantities). We reply within 24–48 business hours.

q2.t: What types of springs do you make?
q2.a: Compression, extension, torsion and wire-formed parts. Wire 0.1–10 mm, small to large series.

q3.a: Yes. We offer study, co-design and fast prototyping before mass production.

q4.a: Depending on complexity and quantity: from a few days to a few weeks. Urgent jobs are possible depending on workshop load.

q5.t: Do you accept small production runs?
q5.a: Yes, we produce prototypes, small runs and large industrial series.

form.title: Write to us
form.subtitle: Describe your need: spring type, dimensions, quantity, material, deadlines…
form.name: Full name
form.subject: Subject

support.title: Help & Support
support.intro: Need help? Check our FAQ or contact our team.

q1.t: How do I change my password?
q1.a: Go to Profile > Shortcuts, then click “Change my password”.

q2.t: I can't sign in, what should I do?
q2.a: Check your email and password. If it still fails, use “Forgot password”.

q3.a: You can reach us by email or phone.

seo.title: MTR — Manufacturer of Springs & Wireforms
seo.description: Since 1994, MTR designs and manufactures compression, extension and torsion springs, plus 2D/3D wireforms. Industrial quality with fast lead times.

hero.title: Industrial springs & traction solutions
hero.subtitle: Quality, precision, reliability — MTR designs and manufactures your custom springs.

presentation.punch: Quality in every spring, reliability at every step.
presentation.card1Text1: Founded in 1994 by Mr. Hbaieb Chokri, the Manufacturer of Springs & Wireforms (MTR) is a Tunisian LLC specialized for over 30 years in designing and manufacturing springs: compression, extension, torsion and shaped springs.
presentation.card2Text1: With proven expertise and recognized technical mastery, MTR delivers custom solutions for demanding needs.
presentation.card2Text2: We produce springs from 0.1 mm to 10 mm wire, in small or large series, to standards or by specification.
presentation.card3Text1: Straightening & cutting (1–12 mm), 2D/3D bending, welded grids/frames, technical or decorative parts.

specialties.title: Our specialties
specialties.subtitle: MTR markets a wide, high-quality range of industrial products.

about.title: About MTR
about.subtitle: Three essentials : capabilities, quality and wire working.
about.li3: Manufactured from 0.1–10 mm metal wire according to plans or specifications
about.li4: Extensive expertise : straightened wire, 2D/3D bent wire, and welded mesh
about.li8: Agile production: from prototypes to large-scale production, optimized lead times
about.li10: Custom-made grids, frames, shapes, and welded assemblies
about.li12: Present in many fields: automotive, household appliances, agriculture, electricity, construction, sports & leisure
